Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using the string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the string connects between the two cups or units, showing the path for sound travel.
The student can depict how sound is being used for communication in the string telephone design.
The student can highlight the use of materials provided in constructing the string telephone.
The student can demonstrate their understanding of the importance of technology in connecting people over distances.
